name: Linkding
author: sissbruecker
description: Linkding is a self-hosted bookmark manager that helps you save, organize and share your bookmarks. It features a clean and simple UI, browser extensions for quick bookmarking, full-text search, and tagging capabilities.

form_fields.label: Initial Admin Username
form_fields.hint: Username for the initial admin user

form_fields.label: Initial Admin Email
form_fields.hint: Email address for the initial admin user

form_fields.label: Initial Admin Password
form_fields.hint: Password for the initial admin user
